arts.ttl: Emi Martinez ‘appalling’ in Aston Villa clanger vs Liverpool, Steven Gerrard says he sent Unai Emery ‘crazy’
arts.sum: Emi Martinez was hugely to blame as Aston Villa lost to Liverpool on Saturday. Villa fell to a 2-0 defeat away to Liverpool as Mohamed... The post Emi Martinez ‘appalling’ in Aston Villa clanger vs Liverpool, Steven Gerrard says he sent Unai Emery ‘crazy’ appeared first on Villa News.

arts.ttl: Liverpool showed character to beat Villa - Slot
arts.sum: Liverpool boss Arne Slot says his side showed great character as they beat Aston Villa 2-0 to end their Premier League losing run.

arts.ttl: Salah scores as Liverpool end losing streak with win over Villa
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah scores his 250th Liverpool goal as the Reds end their four-game Premier League losing streak with victory over Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Liverpool PLAYER RATINGS: Which Reds star was 'unplayable'? Who has nailed his place in Arne Slot's starting XI? But who looked slightly tired during win over Aston Villa
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE AT ANFIELD: Liverpool took the first step on their road to recovery on Saturday night as Mohamed Salah and Ryan Gravenberch netted in a 2-0 win over Aston Villa.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah’s 250th goal sinks Aston Villa to send Liverpool third in Premier League
arts.sum: Liverpool 2-0 Aston Villa: Ryan Gravenberch also scored on his return to the side as Arne Slot’s champions picked up their first points since September

arts.ttl: Forget Mo Salah: Another Liverpool player was back to his best against Aston Villa - opinion
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah matched a Wayne Rooney record as Liverpool beat Aston Villa, but another player was quietly impressive on Saturday. The Reds were much improved...

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah scores 250th Liverpool goal to end losing run against Aston Villa
arts.sum: The Reds came into the match with their Premier League title defence in tatters after four successive defeats.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 2-0 Aston Villa: Unai Emery's side pay the price for poking the bear as Mo Salah and Ryan Gravenberch get Arne Slot's side back on track
arts.sum: DOMINIC KING AT ANFIELD: All Unai Emery would have wanted was for his players to turn Anfield into a doctor's waiting room, filled with tension, but instead they poked the bear.

arts.ttl: Liverpool Player Ratings vs. Aston Villa: Slot’s Controversial Gamble Pays Off
arts.sum: Mohamed Salah and Ryan Gravenberch got on the scoresheet during a contest defined by the energy of Liverpool’s midfield.

arts.ttl: Liverpool 2-0 Aston Villa: Mohamed Salah writes himself into history books as Reds back to winning ways
arts.sum: Champions had gone four games without a victory in the league
